It was my first visit which was decided after going through various doctors profile. But dr.saravanan assistant attends you on first visit as per clinic and that two after one hour waiting time. Medicines prescribed are ayurvedic as per them but it does not seem so and are very expensive. ******* ** *** ********** ******* *** **** *** ** **** ** **** *** ******* ** ** ****** ** * **** ******* Very much disappointed.

Our appointment with Dr Lakshmi Saravanan was very frutiful She was able to explain to us , very clearly what Our condition was and has advised us in a very positive manner for the next steps.
Our only issue was the lack of hygiene in the ARC facility.  That needs to be improved.
